title: Eureka Seven Eng Dub - Complete Series 1-50
description:
Complete ENG DUB Series + Extras + Original JAP Intro and Outro

[img]http://i8.photobucket.com/albums/a10/PharaohAtemuSeto/Eureka%20Seven/_EurekaSevenGroup_2.jpg[/img]

The extended Jap intro and outro have been spliced in over the 
shitty Eng intro/outro it was a bitch to do but they are just 
so much better than the butchered Eng ones.

Extras include pic and .cbr files (This was from a torrent uploaded by someone else before Demonoid went down)

[color=Red]Initial speeds will be slow[/color] my connection sucks so please keep seeding and be patient (dont bitch) 
this series is incredibly hard to find in end dub.


thats about it...... Enjoy
[quote]Genres: action, adventure, comedy, drama, psychological, romance, science fiction
Themes: Mecha, Military, Real Robot
Age rating: Teenagers (May contain bloody violence, bad language, nudity)
Plot Summary: Renton Thurston is a 14-year-old boy who lived with his mechanic grandfather in a backwater town. Every day he dreamed of being with the mercenary \\\"Light Finding Operation (LFO)\\\" aircraft pilot group \\\"Gekkostate\\\" and riding \\\"Trapar\\\" particle waves-- a sport called \\\"reffing\\\"-- with their charismatic leader Holland, especially when faced with his father\\\&#039;s acclaimed past or his grandfather\\\&#039;s desire to protect him. When a young girl named Eureka riding the original LFO, the \\\"Nirvash typeZERO\\\", asks his grandfather for a tune-up, she inadvertently brings the attention of the military to the garage; as a result, the garage is destroyed and Renton is forced to deliver a new type of interface-- the \\\"Amita Drive\\\"-- to the Nirvash. After a heated fight in which the Nirvash destroys the military LFOs by unleashing an immense amount of power, Renton is invited into Gekkostate. However, he quickly realizes that behind the facade of a traveling group of mercenaries is a very bitter reality. [/quote]
